AAM.caption: Text
AAM.doc: Message to be displayed in the toast
AAM.name: text

AAO.caption: Duration
AAO.doc: Duration for which the toast should be displayed. -1 for permanent toast
AAO.name: duration

AAP.caption: Gravity
AAP.doc: To show the toast from top or bottom
AAP.name: gravity

AAQ.caption: Position
AAQ.doc: To show the toast on left or right
AAQ.name: position

AAR.caption: Close
AAR.doc: To show the close icon or not
AAR.name: close

AAS.caption: Stop on Focus
AAS.doc: To stop timer when hovered over the toast (Only if duration is set)
AAS.name: stoponfocus

AAT.caption: Avatar
AAT.doc: Image/icon to be shown before text
AAT.name: avatar

AAU.caption: Background Color
AAU.doc: Sets the background color of the toast
AAU.name: backgroundcolor
